set() - Method in class room_features.FeatureManipulator
Updates feature status of existing non-core feature; Searches for existing features that matches input feature_name; If found and feature_name is a core feature, error message is displayed; If found and feature_name is not a core feature, a message displayed queues the user for new status input for this feature; If not found, error message is displayed;
